nodes.bodyText: I mean it's smaller than the same plugin.xml file for databricks 64. It's quite strange, no strong concern here but maybe some module groups are missing or removed?

nodes.bodyText: its not, only GCS is different, but the module group is not declared in any dbr so I'm not sure we support it atm

nodes.bodyText: could you please rename it?
should be a constant as well
return Collections.singleton(ESparkVersion.SPARK_3_0);
can be in 1 line.
any method calls in the constructor are not recommended. Are there any ways to refactor it?
sadly its been like this and I'm not sure this can be refactored since its a bout module groups ...
should be static finalas well
is there a difference between final static and final static ? (ill still change the order since the others are like that)
no difference, just a convention
Please rename it as well. Maybe there is a way to reuse this logic? E.g. to move to separate factory method or to make it a constant if it's immutable.
it seems 1 assert per method rule isn't about this part of code :D

where is 2.1 and 2.4?
You can make a list, verify that size is 1 and there is only 3.0 element. You don't need to verify false on each element

those are all auto generated I guess, I don't know why they are missing and I also am not sure those tests are that great ... :D
I kept them as they seem to be working ...
